Package com.polidea.rxandroidble.internal.connection

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConnectionComponent  
    ConnectionComponent.Builder  
    ConnectionStateChangeListener  
    ConnectionSubscriptionWatcher
    Interface for all classes that should be called when the user subscribes/unsubscribes to RxBleDevice.establishConnection(boolean) The binding which injects the interface to a ConnectorImpl is in ConnectionModuleBinder
    Connector  
    DisconnectionRouterOutput
    Interface to output disconnection error causes.
    PayloadSizeLimitProvider
